message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a great deal for you, and I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
I appreciate your offer, Alice! However, I was thinking of a lower price. I'm willing to pay $100 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking of a slightly higher price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $105.
I understand that you're looking for a slightly higher price, Alice. I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I'm willing to pay $102.50 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle. However, I was thinking of a slightly higher price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $108.
I'm getting close to your price, Alice. I'm willing to pay $106.50 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm still a bit above your offer. I'm willing to sell it to you for $109.
I'm not willing to go above $106.50, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway again. Can you consider my offer?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your position. However, I'm still looking for a better deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $107.
I'm not willing to go above $106.50, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway one last time. Can you consider my offer?
